short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This GoT Spoiler Blocker protects you from the Game of Thrones Season 8 spoilers that are out there anywhere on the Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a Game of Thrones spoiler blocker. It protects you from the Game of Thrones spoilers that are out there on the Internet. It will give you a warning page when possible spoilers are detected. You can disable the warnings at any time.



Updated to significantly improve potential spoiler detection and to indicate the severity of the spoiler warnings.
